Our Core Services

Comprehensive Solar Panel Recycling Solutions

From collection to material recovery, we provide end-to-end solar panel recycling services that support Australia's transition to a circular economy.

Solar Panel Recycling

Advanced processing technology that recovers up to 95% of materials from end-of-life solar panels, including silicon, silver, aluminum, and glass.

  • 95% material recovery rate
  • Zero landfill guarantee
  • Certified destruction processes
  • Detailed reporting and certificates

National Collection & Logistics

Nationwide pickup and transportation services with specialized handling for solar panels, ensuring safe and efficient collection from any location.

  • Australia-wide coverage
  • Specialized transport vehicles
  • Flexible scheduling
  • Bulk collection services

Clean Material Recovery

High-purity material extraction that meets industry standards for reuse in new solar panels and other applications, closing the circular economy loop.

  • Industry-grade purity levels
  • Quality certification
  • Supply chain integration
  • Sustainable material sourcing

Why Choose PV Industries

Australia's Most Trusted Solar Recycling Partner

We combine cutting-edge technology, proven expertise, and unwavering commitment to sustainability to deliver the most comprehensive solar recycling solutions in Australia.

Industry Leadership

As Australia's pioneer in solar panel recycling, we've set the standards that others follow. Our proven track record speaks for itself.

200+ satisfied customers

Industries We Serve

Comprehensive Solar Recycling Across All Sectors

From residential installations to large-scale commercial projects, we provide tailored solar panel recycling solutions for every industry and application.

Residential Solar

Homeowner solar panel recycling services with convenient pickup and transparent reporting for end-of-life residential systems.

  • Door-to-door collection
  • Homeowner certificates
  • Flexible scheduling
  • Competitive pricing

Commercial & Industrial

Large-scale recycling solutions for commercial buildings, warehouses, and industrial facilities with bulk processing capabilities.

  • Bulk collection services
  • Project management
  • Compliance documentation
  • Volume discounts

Utility-Scale Solar

Specialized handling of utility-scale solar farm decommissioning with advanced logistics and processing capabilities.

  • Large-scale logistics
  • On-site processing
  • Regulatory compliance
  • Environmental reporting

Solar Installers

Partnership programs for solar installation companies to offer comprehensive end-of-life services to their customers.

  • Installer partnerships
  • Customer referrals
  • Technical support
  • Marketing materials

Government & Public

Specialized services for government buildings, schools, and public infrastructure with full compliance and reporting.

  • Tender compliance
  • Public reporting
  • Educational programs
  • Sustainability metrics

Agricultural Solar

Rural and agricultural solar system recycling with understanding of remote locations and farming operations.

  • Rural collection
  • Agricultural expertise
  • Seasonal flexibility
  • Farm-friendly service

Don't See Your Industry Listed?

We work with organizations across all sectors. Contact us to discuss your specific solar recycling needs and how we can help.

Our Commitment to Sustainability

Leading Australia's Circular Economy Revolution

At PV Industries, sustainability isn't just what we do—it's who we are. Every decision we make is guided by our unwavering commitment to environmental stewardship and creating a truly circular economy for solar energy.

100% Diversion Rate

Zero Waste to Landfill

We guarantee that 100% of solar panels processed through our facilities are diverted from landfill sites.

  • Comprehensive material recovery processes
  • Alternative disposal methods for non-recyclable components
  • Detailed tracking and reporting systems
  • Third-party verification and certification
95% Material Recovery

Circular Economy Integration

Recovered materials are reintegrated into new solar panel manufacturing, creating a true circular economy.

  • High-purity silicon extraction
  • Precious metal recovery (silver, copper)
  • Aluminum frame processing
  • Glass recycling for new applications
Net Zero Emissions

Carbon Neutral Operations

Our facilities operate with net-zero carbon emissions through renewable energy and carbon offset programs.

  • 100% renewable energy powered facilities
  • Carbon offset programs for transportation
  • Energy-efficient processing equipment
  • Continuous emissions monitoring

Sustainability Initiatives

Research & Development

Continuous investment in innovative recycling technologies to improve efficiency and environmental outcomes.

Industry Collaboration

Working with manufacturers, installers, and policymakers to establish industry-wide sustainability standards.

Education & Awareness

Promoting awareness about solar panel recycling and sustainable practices throughout the industry.

Future Innovation

Developing next-generation recycling processes to handle emerging solar technologies and materials.

Partner with Australia's Sustainability Leader

Join us in creating a truly sustainable future for solar energy. Together, we can close the loop on solar sustainability and build a circular economy that benefits everyone.
